components.name: Rack and Pinion Steering Gear
components.function: Converts steering wheel rotation into corresponding movement of the front wheels

components.name: Steering Column
components.function: Transmits steering torque from steering wheel to steering gear or power steering box

components.name: Tie Rods
components.function: Connect the outer ends of the steering linkage to the steering knuckles

components.name: Center Link
components.function: Connects the inner ends of the tie rods and provides a connection point for the steering idler arm
